name: build_stairs_seed456
description: The robot builds stairs from three blocks and then climbs them.

children.name: Build_Stairs
children.description: The robot positions the small, medium, and large blocks to form a stair-like structure.

children.name: Position_Small_Block_for_robot_interaction
children.description: The robot walks to and pushes the Small Block for robot interaction into its designated base position for the stairs.

children.name: walk_to_Small_Block_for_robot_interaction
children.description: The robot walks to a position near the Small Block for robot interaction, ready to interact with it. Goal state: Robot is within pushing distance of the Small Block for robot interaction.

children.name: push_Small_Block_for_robot_interaction_to_base_position
children.description: The robot pushes the Small Block for robot interaction to its designated base position, forming the first step of the stairs. Goal state: Small Block for robot interaction is in its final base stair position, stable and ready for the next block.

children.name: Position_Medium_Block_for_robot_interaction
children.description: The robot walks to and pushes the Medium Block for robot interaction into its designated middle position, adjacent to the Small Block, to form the second step.

children.name: walk_to_Medium_Block_for_robot_interaction
children.description: The robot walks to a position near the Medium Block for robot interaction, ready to interact with it. Goal state: Robot is within pushing distance of the Medium Block for robot interaction.

children.name: push_Medium_Block_for_robot_interaction_to_middle_position
children.description: The robot pushes the Medium Block for robot interaction to its designated middle stair position, adjacent to the Small Block for robot interaction. Goal state: Medium Block for robot interaction is in its final middle stair position, stable and ready for the next block.

children.name: Position_Large_Block_for_robot_interaction
children.description: The robot walks to and pushes the Large Block for robot interaction into its designated top position, adjacent to the Medium Block, to complete the stairs.

children.name: walk_to_Large_Block_for_robot_interaction
children.description: The robot walks to a position near the Large Block for robot interaction, ready to interact with it. Goal state: Robot is within pushing distance of the Large Block for robot interaction.

children.name: push_Large_Block_for_robot_interaction_to_top_position
children.description: The robot pushes the Large Block for robot interaction to its designated top stair position, adjacent to the Medium Block for robot interaction. Goal state: Large Block for robot interaction is in its final top stair position, completing the stair structure.

children.name: Climb_Stairs
children.description: The robot climbs the newly built stairs by jumping onto each block in sequence.

children.name: Ascend_Small_Block_for_robot_interaction
children.description: The robot walks to the Small Block for robot interaction and jumps onto its top surface.

children.name: walk_to_Small_Block_for_robot_interaction_for_climb
children.description: The robot walks to a position suitable for jumping onto the Small Block for robot interaction. Goal state: Robot is positioned directly in front of the Small Block for robot interaction, ready to jump.

children.name: jump_onto_Small_Block_for_robot_interaction
children.description: The robot performs a jump to land on top of the Small Block for robot interaction. Goal state: Robot is standing stably on top of the Small Block for robot interaction.

children.name: Ascend_Medium_Block_for_robot_interaction
children.description: The robot walks from the Small Block to the Medium Block and jumps onto its top surface.

children.name: walk_to_Medium_Block_for_robot_interaction_for_climb
children.description: The robot walks from its current position (on or near the Small Block) to a position suitable for jumping onto the Medium Block for robot interaction. Goal state: Robot is positioned directly in front of the Medium Block for robot interaction, ready to jump.

children.name: jump_onto_Medium_Block_for_robot_interaction
children.description: The robot performs a jump to land on top of the Medium Block for robot interaction. Goal state: Robot is standing stably on top of the Medium Block for robot interaction.

children.name: Ascend_Large_Block_for_robot_interaction
children.description: The robot walks from the Medium Block to the Large Block and jumps onto its top surface.

children.name: walk_to_Large_Block_for_robot_interaction_for_climb
children.description: The robot walks from its current position (on or near the Medium Block) to a position suitable for jumping onto the Large Block for robot interaction. Goal state: Robot is positioned directly in front of the Large Block for robot interaction, ready to jump.

children.name: jump_onto_Large_Block_for_robot_interaction
children.description: The robot performs a jump to land on top of the Large Block for robot interaction. Goal state: Robot is standing stably on top of the Large Block for robot interaction, completing the climb.
